alert.note: Alert for Custer Co Plains; Hermosa Foothills; Northern Oglala Lakota; Pennington Co Plains; Rapid City; Southern Meade Co Plains; Sturgis, Piedmont Foothills (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued November 19 at 12:33PM MST until November 20 at 8:00PM MST by NWS RapidCity
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 7 AM TO 8 PM MST MONDAY... * WHAT...Northwest winds 25 to 40 mph with gusts around 50 mph expected. * WHERE...Portions of northwestern and southwestern South Dakota. This includes the Tribal Lands of the Pine Ridge Reservation. * WHEN...From 7 AM to 8 PM MST Monday. * IMPACTS...Sudden wind gusts can cause drivers to lose control, especially in lightweight or high profile vehicles. Strong winds can cause blowing dust, reduced visibility, and flying debris.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.
